name: CANADIAN SNOWBIRD ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Passage of H.R. 3513, Canadian Snowbird Visa Act that would create a retired person's visa for eligible Canadian citizens. This would amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to authorize admission o
